document_data.name: Vylxildross
document_data.mainbody: '''Vylxildross the Malevolent''' was a powerful [[red dragon]] allied with the [[Cult of the Dragon]] and the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Vylxildross the Malevolent was present at the [[Dragonbone Vale]], where the Cult of the Dragon, with the help from the [[Red Wizards of Thay]], planned on making the prophecy of the ''[[Chronicle of Years to Come]]'' come true. When [[Valindra Shadowmantle]]'s ''[[Rite of the Dracolich]]'' was interrupted, Vylxildross faced adventurers and heroes of [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Scaleblight Summit]].
